title: Avoid like the plague!
review: Wasted Â£5.49 renting in sky, story line diabolical, tells nothing about the real Borley, acting was mediocre at best. I was looking forward to this as an interested in Borley Rectory, wished I handnt wasted my time. Should have read reviews before renting. Watch something else instead, Postman Pat for example.

title: Nope
review: Sorry but this is appalling. The title should read "The haunting of anywhere, but Borley Rectory." This was not an account of the rectory, its hauntings or the people who lived there and I should know as one of them was my nan.

title: Diabolical
review: This film is so bad, the acting so wooden, I was praying there was actually a real ghost and that it would come and kill me before I had to endure this tedious, tiresome, borefest of a movie !!
